org.lenskit.util.table

Interface Column

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Collection<Object>, Iterable<Object>, List<Object>

    public interface Column
extends List<Object>

    A view of a column of a table.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double average()
      Get the average of this column.
      double sum()
      Get the sum of this column.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.List

        add, add, addAll, addAll, clear, contains, containsAll, equals, get, hashCode, indexOf, isEmpty, iterator, lastIndexOf, listIterator, listIterator, remove, remove, removeAll, replaceAll, retainAll, set, size, sort, spliterator, subList, toArray, toArray

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.Collection

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

    • Method Detail

      • sum

        double sum()

        Get the sum of this column. Null entries result in a sum of NaN.

        Returns:
        The column’s sum.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there are any non-null, non-numeric entries in the table.

      • average

        double average()

        Get the average of this column. Null entries and empty tables result in NaN.

        Returns:
        The column’s average.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there are any non-null, non-numeric entries in the table.
